title: Next generation of pokemon needs to have pokemon follow you again, AND
body:
Have that mechanic replace HMs.

Don't use Surf. Turn around and talk to Lapras and say yes when the screen asks if you wanna ride it.

Don't have a bike. Turn around and talk to Dodrio. Run around on your giant three headed ostrich.
Base the travel speed on the pokemon's speed stat. And give slower ones nifty abilities like inherently pushing aside boulders and knocking down trees.

This is necessary, because the maximum amount of swag a trainer could possibly have is riding into town on a gyarados and giving no fucks about anyone shocked to see the twenty foot long aquatic python.

And the fact that it's a criminal offense that you can't actually ride a Rapidash.
